summary: Small and medium-sized manufacturers may have difficulty finding the capital needed to use or produce innovative technologies. To help foster innovative technologies in these businesses, the America COMPETES Act of 2010 directed that a loan guarantee program be established. We have conducted biennial reviews of the program. Since our last report , the Commerce Department has taken additional steps to implement the program and address...
title: Innovative Manufacturing: Commerce Has Continued Efforts to Create a Loan Guarantee Program, but Future Steps Are Uncertain
